title: CoreOS Build & Integration Engineering Manager
summary: The people here at Apple craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. The CoreOS Software Build & Integration team is working to take the integration, build, and test process of the low-level components of iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS to the next level.
description: As a CoreOS Build & Integration Engineering Manager, you’ll oversee the build and verification process of the Kernel and related components for all of Apple’s OS releases.
key_qualifications: You have strong software development skills and experience with TDD standard methodologies. Proficient with Git and other version control systems. Experience with crafting, running, and solving problems in native builds.
